edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.pruner
Interface Pruner

All Superinterfaces:
Configurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
NullPruner, SimplePruner
public interface Pruner
extends Configurable

Provides a mechanism for pruning a set of StateTokens
